full_summary:
**Title:**
Provision of Energy Performance Contracts

**Reference Number:** MX-42893826350
**Solicitation Number:** EPC2023_78425

**Tender Details:**
The Government of Canada is calling for Expression of Interest (EOI) from qualified firms to provide Energy Performance Contracts (EPC) for infrastructure located in various locations across Canada. The primary objective is to achieve improvements in energy efficiency under EPC.

**Key Information:**

* **EOI Deadline:** The deadline for submitting EOI is November 22, 2023, at 14:00:00 (EST).
* **Pre-qualification Period:** The pre-qualified list will be valid for a period of three (3) years, with the possibility of extension by two (2) one-year periods.
* **Security Requirements:** The selected firm must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP) within Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC).

**Procurement Details:**
The procurement process will be competitive, with open bidding. Firms interested in participating must submit their proposal through the MERX Electronic Bidding System on or before the deadline.

**Contact Information:**
For any inquiries or questions, please contact:

* **Name:** Camille Attia
* **Email:** [camille.attia@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:camille.attia@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** 613-715-0564

**Notice and Documents:**
* **Notice URL:** https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2631970221/abstract?language=EN
* **Documents:** Available on http://www.merx.com, fees may apply.
Please note that the preliminary results for this solicitation will be available on MERX. Proponents can obtain contract award results from the DCC Website at Contract Activity - Defence Construction Canada (dcc-cdc.gc.ca) Bidding and Documents are available on http://www.merx.com. Fees may apply.
